title: 2nd Place (₩2,000,000)
event: Korea University College of Informatics NE:XT Software Contest

details.Description: A contest hosted by the College of Informatics at Korea University. Led the development of AI services for the dating assistant app Rendi.

title: Honourable Mention (₩300,000)
event: Digital Competition of the Nat’l Program of Excellence in Software

details.Description: A competition hosted by the Ministry of Science&ICT. Developed an OOD classification model for detecting fake audio.
A competition hosted by the Ministry of Science&ICT and the National Information Society Agency. Developed a Korean speech recognition model tailored for the elderly and children.
